name: Bit-Ships
description:
Summary

You are defender of the galaxy who is being attacked by unknown ships. You have to use your ships in order to survive and ultimately, destroy the enemy.
The game presents the following:
- farm asteroids: use your 4 miner ships that are spawned at the beginning of the game to farm asteroids and gain cash
- build menu: by pressing the icon in the bottom left corner of the screen, you can build factories, research facilities, walls and turrets.
- factories: this is your main source of ships. Such ships incluse tanks, snipers and shotguns
- research facilities: this is how you upgrade your tanks and discover new ships and other mechanics.

Controls:
- click: move units/access factory or research facility
- click and hold: select units
- right click: cancel selection
- E: close menu
- P: Pause
- R: reset camera to base
-Group ships by selecting some of them, and then by pressing Ctrl+(a number from 1 to 9)
-Pressing the number of a group will only select that particular group
-Pressing the number again will teleport the camera to that group

Your goal is to destroy the 4 planets on the 4 sides of the map. Good luck, commander.

Credits:
Music: "The Little Broth" by Rolemusic which is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution License (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
All sound effects are made using bfxr.
Note: The game is best played in fullscreen mode.
